Annotation

Use an annotation to hightlight metadata on your page or component. Display extra side-information like the author, publication date, copyright notice, etc. The annotated text will be displayed in a lighter gray color.

Installation 

                  
                    npm i @govflanders/vl-ui-annotation

or 

                  
                    yarn add @govflanders/vl-ui-annotation

Usage

Import SASS 

                  
                  @import "vl-ui-annotation/src/scss/annotation";

Make sure your sass --include-path includes node_modules/@govflanders/.

Default annotation

Van toepassing op 
      <span class="vl-annotation">Van toepassing op</span>

Annotation with an icon

Bevoegde instantie Werk en Sociale Economie • juli 2018 • Deel van collectie 
      <div class="vl-icon-wrapper">
    <i class="vl-icon vl-icon--before vl-icon--light vl-vi vl-vi-calendar"></i>
  <span class="vl-annotation">Bevoegde instantie Werk en Sociale Economie • juli 2018 • Deel van collectie</span>
  </div>

Small annotation variant within a title

Districtchef (6 vacatures) 

      <h2 class="vl-title vl-title--h2">
  Districtchef
  <span class="vl-annotation vl-annotation--small">(6 vacatures)</span>
</h2>
